text: Barry Sonnenfeld (born April 1, 1953) is an American filmmaker and television director. He is known for director The Addams Family (1991) and its sequel Addams Family Values (1993), Get Shorty (1995), Men in Black (1997), Men in Black II (2002), Men in Black III (2012), and Wild Wild West (1999). ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:American cinematographers Category:American television directors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:American television producers
title: Barry Sonnenfeld
